New Records: The New York Yankees achieved their highest scoring game with a 22-1 victory over the Boston Red Sox on September 14, 2024.
Key Match Events: The game was played at Yankee Stadium with a final score of 7-1 in favor of the New York Yankees.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was attended by 46,378 fans and featured key performances from players including Aaron Judge and Rafael Devers.
Others: The game was umpired by Marvin Hudson, Hunter Wendelstedt, Charlie Ramos, and John Tumpane, ending at 2:51 PM.
